definition: station where transport vehicles load or unload passengers or goods
details:
noun
- station where transport vehicles load or unload passengers or goods
= synonyms: terminal
- either end of a railroad or bus route
- (architecture) a statue or a human bust or an animal carved out of the top of a square pillar
= synonyms: terminal figure
- the ultimate goal for which something is done
= synonyms: destination
- a place where something ends or is complete
= synonyms: termination
